00066 #ifndef SAT_H_
00067 #define SAT_H_
00068 
00069 #include "inference.h"
00070 
00075 class SAT : public Inference
00076 {
00077  public:
00078  
00079   SAT(VariableState* state, long int seed, const bool& trackClauseTrueCnts) : 
00080     Inference(state, seed, trackClauseTrueCnts) {}
00081     // Virtual destructor
00082   virtual ~SAT() {}
00083 
00084   const int getNumSolutions()
00085   {
00086     return numSolutions_;
00087   }
00088   
00089   void setNumSolutions(const int& numSolutions)
00090   {
00091     numSolutions_ = numSolutions;
00092   }
00093  
00094   const long double getTargetCost()
00095   {
00096     return targetCost_;
00097   }
00098   
00099   void setTargetCost(const long double& targetCost)
00100   {
00101     targetCost_ = targetCost;
00102   }
00103 
00107   void printProbabilities(ostream& out)
00108   {
00109     for (int i = 0; i < state_->getNumAtoms(); i++)
00110     {
00111       state_->printGndPred(i, out);
00112       out << " " << state_->getValueOfLowAtom(i + 1) << endl;
00113     }
00114   }
00115 
00125   void getPredsWithNonZeroProb(vector<string>& nonZeroPreds,
00126                                vector<float>& probs)
00127   {
00128     nonZeroPreds.clear();
00129     probs.clear();
00130     for (int i = 0; i < state_->getNumAtoms(); i++)
00131     {
00132       if (state_->getValueOfLowAtom(i + 1))
00133       {
00134         ostringstream oss(ostringstream::out);
00135         state_->printGndPred(i, oss);
00136         nonZeroPreds.push_back(oss.str());
00137         probs.push_back(1);
00138       }
00139     }
00140   }
00141 
00145   double getProbability(GroundPredicate* const& gndPred)
00146   {
00147     int idx = state_->getGndPredIndex(gndPred);
00148     int truthValue = 0;
00149     if (idx >= 0) truthValue = state_->getValueOfLowAtom(idx + 1);
00150     return truthValue;
00151   }
00152 
00156   void printTruePreds(ostream& out)
00157   {
00158     for (int i = 0; i < state_->getNumAtoms(); i++)
00159     {
00160       if (state_->getValueOfLowAtom(i + 1))
00161       {
00162         state_->printGndPred(i, out);
00163         out << endl;
00164       }
00165     }
00166   }
00167   
00168  protected:
00169 
00171     // Max. number of tries the SAT-solver will do before giving up
00172   int maxTries_;
00173     // Max. number of steps the SAT-solver will do in each try before giving up
00174   int maxSteps_;
00175     // Target weight SAT-solver will try to reach
00176   long double targetCost_;
00177     // Number of solutions which the SAT-solver will produce
00178   int numSolutions_;
00180 
00181   
00182     // Marks the iteration of the last time an atom was flipped
00183   Array<int> changed_;
00184     // Number of changes so far
00185   int numFlips_;
00186   
00187 };
00188  
00189 #endif /*SAT_H_*/
